channel.title: Opening the server
channel.description: ok i run off a modem so i dont need to portforward but idk what to do.. i have my server set up and stuff i just cant login to it on my client. i have an ARRIS modem and i can only login on moparscape clien. plz help thanks

item.title: Opening the server
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

make sure the client you using is configured to your ip . you still have to set up no-ip btw .

Read full topic
